channel.title: Looking for material
channel.description:
Hey there, everyone! I'm new here, but I have a pretty serious question as my first post:
Does anyone have any good papers or books for exploit-development in Ruby?
I know there are more practical languages to use, but I really want to learn more about exploit dev in ruby so I can add it to my resume. :slight_smile:
Thanks everyone!

item.title: Looking for material
item.dc:creator: system
item.description:
This topic was automatically closed after 121 days. New replies are no longer allowed.

Read full topic

item.title: Looking for material
item.dc:creator: statusredox
item.description:
ComputerWeekly.com

Exploit development tutorial - Part Deux

In our exploit development tutorial’s second part, we examine how you can write exploits in PERL. Then we see how to port exploits by scripting in Ruby.

Read full topic
